property.value: Response: after you count income, add 2 gold to your income. Limit 1 per round. Play only if you control fewer characters than any opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Challenges: kneel 3 influence to kill all attacking characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Response: after defenders have been declared, kneel 2 influence to change the effect of winning the challenge to that of another challenge type.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Dominance: kneel 4 influence to give all characters without attachments -2 STR until the end of the phase. Characters are killed if their STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Dominance: kneel 1 influence to choose a character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Challenges: kneel 2 influence to choose an attacking or defending character. Remove that character from the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Challenges: kneel X influence and discard X of your defending characters from play (cannot be saved) to choose and kill X attacking characters (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Dominance: kneel X influence to choose an opponent. Discard X power from that opponent's House card.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Marshalling: kneel 1 influence to kneel all locations in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Dominance: kneel 4 influence to put into play from their owners' dead piles all characters with printed cost 3 or higher.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Marshalling: kneel 2 influence to choose a player. That player shuffles his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Response: kneel 2 influence to cancel a triggered effect.

card.name: Only Death Can Pay for Life

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Response: after a Targaryen character is killed, kneel 1 influence to choose a non-unique character from your dead pile and put it into play. At the end of the phase, that character is killed (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: cancel the effects of an event card that does not have a gold cost or influence cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Challenges: kneel 3 influence to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Challenges: kneel X influence to choose and stand X characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: until the end of the phase, Clansman characters are immune to events and character abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Response: after an opponent plays an event card, kneel 2 influence to copy the effects of that event card (ignoring costs and play restrictions).

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Dominance: kneel 2 influence to search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: discard a Targaryen attachment you control from play (cannot be saved) to lower the cost of the next card you play this phase by X. X is equal to the gold cost of the attachment plus 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Response: kneel 1 influence to save any number of Warship locations from being discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Marshalling: kneel 2 influence to choose a location in your discard pile. Put that location into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Response: save up to 2 characters, each with at least one attachment, from being killed or discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Any phase: kneel 1 influence to choose a character. Kneel that character.

property.name: Type
property.value: Story Event

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: each player with fewer Story Event cards in his or her discard pile than you must choose one of his or her characters and return that character to its owner's hand. Then, you draw a card for each character returned to hand in this way.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Challenges: kneel 1 influence to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a military icon, an intrique icon, and a power icon.

property.name: Type
property.value: Story Event

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot play Frey Hospitality unless you have at least three Story Event cards in your discard pile. Dominance: choose an opponent with fewer Story Event cards in his or her discard pile than you. Search that player's deck for up to 4 cards and put those cards into his or her discard pile. Then shuffle his or her deck. Limit 1 per game.

property.name: Type
property.value: Story Event

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel X influence to give X Night's Watch characters renown until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Response: after you count income, add X to your income, where X is the number of characters an opponent controls. Limit 1 per phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: until the end of the phase, lower the chost for you to play characters with printed cost 3 or higher by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Response: after a Baratheon character you control is killed, kneel X influence to move X power onto your House from that character. X is equal to the number of power on that character. Then, claim 1 power for your House.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot play Tyrion's Chain unless you have at least 3 Story Event cards in your discard pile. Challenges: choose an opponent with fewer Story Event cards in his or her discard pile than you. That opponent cannot declare attackers against you this round. Limit 1 per game.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Challenges: kneel 3 influence to choose a character in any opponent's discard pile. Put that character into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Dominance: kneel 5 influence to kill all characters in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: kneel 2 influence to discard all attachments from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of each challenges phase, stand all of your characters. There is an additional challenges phase this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Lower the cost for you to play attachments by 1 this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: The income on each opponent's revealed plot card is reduced to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each influence providing location you control provides an additional 1 influence.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters and locations are immune to events this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. When revealed, announce a challenge type. You cannot declare attackers or defenders except during this challenge type.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may initiate an additional power challenge this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. You cannot play events this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. When revealed, each player draws 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters without attachments cannot be declared as defenders this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each player discards the top X cards of his or her deck. X is the number of characters in his or her dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose a character. Kneel that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. When revealed, each player puts the top card of his or her discard pile into his or her hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may initiate an additional intrigue challenge this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, copy the 'When revealed' ability of an opponent's revealed plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. When revealed, you may put a Martell character with cost 3 or lower from your hand into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you win initiative this round, you must choose to act first.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot draw any cards during the draw phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, you draw a card for each Lord or Lady character in all players' dead piles.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, search your deck for an influence providing location with cost 1 or lower and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of the standing phase, choose one kneeling character or location controlled by each player. Return all chosen cards to their owners' hands.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may initiate an additional military challenge this round

property.name: Text
property.value: During military challenges this round, players cannot declare defenders.

property.name: Text
property.value: During power challenges this round, players cannot declare defenders.

property.name: Text
property.value: During intrigue challenges this round, players cannot declare defenders.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, put the topmost attachment in your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play an additional Limited location this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: The cost for you to play cards cannot be lowered.

property.name: Text
property.value: You need 5 additional power to win the game. When you announce Treaty as your Agenda, announce a House. Ignore the out-of-House gold penalty to play characters, locations and attachments from the announced House.

property.name: Text
property.value: You need 5 additional power to win the game. You may play with up to four copies of any card in your deck (or five copies if that card is a House Frey character).

property.name: Text
property.value: You need 5 additional power to win the game. Ignore the out-of-House gold penalty to play Maester characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: You need 5 additional power to win the game. Night's Watch characters you control may be declared as attackers or defenders during military and power challenges.
